title: logistics mall API
description: elastic.io component for connecting to logistics mall

getItemMaster.title: Create a Item  (JAX-RS)
getItemMaster.description: Retrieves items from the logistics mall API by given item status using Java API for RESTful Web Services (JAX-RS)

getShipment.title: Create a Shipment (JAX-RS)
getShipment.description: Retrieves shipments from the logistics mall API by given shipment status using Java API for RESTful Web Services (JAX-RS)
